statements: DELETE FROM simulations WHERE simulation_id = 1 AND algorithm_used = 'A*';
DELETE FROM simulations WHERE simulation_name = 'Monte Carlo' AND performance_metrics->>'time_taken' > '10ms';
DELETE FROM test_scenarios WHERE test_type = 'stress' AND scenario_id = 10;
DELETE FROM testing_scenarios WHERE scenario_name = 'Highway Scenario';
DELETE FROM algorithm_performance WHERE algorithm_id = 1 AND simulation_id = 100;
DELETE FROM simulation_results WHERE success = FALSE AND distance_covered < 1000;
DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE year < 2010 AND manufacturer = 'Toyota';
